settings.heading: Isaac Toups x Spiceology
settings.content: With a culinary style inspired equally by his time in the fine-dining kitchen of Emeril Lagasse and time spent at his grandmother’s kitchen table, Chef Isaac is delivering his unique take on Cajun cuisine to your family table.

settings.heading: About Chef Isaac Toups
settings.text: One hundred percent Cajun, born and braised, Chef Isaac Toups is a fan favorite… no really, he was voted fan favorite on Season 13 of Bravo’s Top Chef. This James Beard-nominated chef and owner of Toups’ Meatery is known for his updated sophisticated approach to Cajun cuisine and penchant for being photographed with his two-handed gumbo paddle.
